pages.title: Liquid Mud
pages.text: Mud. It is wet mud. Not particularly interesting in itself. What is practical is the collision of the mud with other liquids, like [#](bb00bb)Water[#]() or [#](bb00bb)Lava[#](). This creates [#](bb00bb)Dirt[#]() or [#](bb00bb)Coarse Dirt[#](), respectively.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: _While a mud bath sounds like wellness, it is not advised._

pages.title: Item Conversion
pages.text: Some items that come into contact with Mud get tanned.\For example, [#](bb00bb)Rotten Flesh[#]() will be converted to a tiny piece of [#](bb00bb)Hide[#]().
